callToAction.title: The Nobel Prize: A Prestigious Recognition of Excellence.

topNews.title: 2022 Nobel Prize laureates in discussion
topNews.shortContent: Join Nobel Prize laureates as they engage in a lively discussion about their award-winning discoveries and achievements, and explore the potential practical applications of their work. The thought-provoking conversation is moderated by Zeinab Badawi of the BBC in "Nobel Minds."

topNews.title: 2022 Nobel Prizes: List of Winners
topNews.shortContent: The 2022 Nobel Prize winners were announced, honoring individuals who have made exceptional contributions to their respective fields. The Nobel Prizes, which are awarded annually in six categories - Physics, Chemistry, Medicine, Literature, Peace, and Economics.
